name: WP Careerjet Shortcode
author: B & L Marketing

sections.description:
Sign up for a free Careerjet affiliate account. Then add affiliate job listings from Careerjet and get paid for clicks!

Support

We will do our best to support this plugin via the WordPress forums. Please only request support for bugs. We will not provide support for any plugin customization.

Features

  • Add Careerjet affiliate job listings to posts, pages, or widgets with simple shortcodes and get paid when visitors click on job listings.
  • Add Careerjet job search forms.
  • Customize job listings to match your site.
  • Create job listings as bulleted lists and add to content and sidebar widgets.*

B&L Marketing

We specialize in internet marketing and passive income strategies. For more information visit B&L Marketing online.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the wp-careerjet-shortcode folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Active the WP Careerjet Shortcode plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin by going to the Settings -> WP Careerjet Shortcode menu that appears in your admin menu
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the wp-careerjet-shortcode folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Active the WP Careerjet Shortcode plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin by going to the Settings -> WP Careerjet Shortcode menu that appears in your admin menu
